actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to reinstate the nonbusiness deduction for State and local taxes on gasoline and other motor fuels.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reinstate the nonbusiness deduction from the income tax on individuals for State and local taxes on the sale of gasoline, diesel fuel, and other fuels.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to reinstate the nonbusiness deduction for State and local taxes on gasoline and other motor fuels.
